citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a written environmental enhancement plan to promote the overall psychological well-being of
the birds at the facility. At the time of inspection, the facility had 9 doves, 11 budgerigar, and 1 love bird, although they
have a varying number of bird numbers and species throughout the year. Failure to develop and document an
environmental enhancement program for birds can negatively impact their health and well-being, causing unnecessary
psychological distress. Dealers must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan for environmental
enhancement to promote the psychological well-being of birds that is within industry standards and approved by the
attending veterinarian. This plan must be made available to APHIS upon request and address each category listed in
3.154. Correct by January 12, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility does not have a written environmental enhancement plan to promote the overall psychological well-being of 
the birds at the facility. At the time of inspection, the facility had 9 doves, 11 budgerigar, and 1 love bird, although they 
have a varying number of bird numbers and species throughout the year. Failure to develop and document an 
environmental enhancement program for birds can negatively impact their health and well-being, causing unnecessary 
psychological distress. Dealers must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan for environmental 
enhancement to promote the psychological well-being of birds that is within industry standards and approved by the 
attending veterinarian. This plan must be made available to APHIS upon request and address each category listed in 
3.154. Correct by January 12, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
